name: Extreme Diarrhea
description:
There's already someone in the toilet.

You play as Hunter, an intrepid millennial who's currently suffering from diarrhea. Your goal is to find a toilet ASAP, but when you do, things may prove more challenging than previously thought...

This is my first dialogue based game project. Had a lot of fun making this one. Hope you enjoy it!

Play time: 1-2 minutes

Made for: GoedWare Game Jam #1 (theme: "Extremes")
